question:
The Trak Island has been in news recently. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It is located in the Bay of Bengal.
  2. BrahMos surface-to-surface missiles were tested here.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Trak Island is located in the Bay of Bengal. It is a part of the Andaman and Nicobar group of islands. It is located in the Nicobar group of islands, north of the Little Nicobar Island. It belongs to the Southern Group known as the Sambelong. Â Statement 2 is correct: Two BrahMos surface to surface missiles were tested at the Trak Island in October. It is a part of routine operational training. The missiles successfully hit the target. The targets were set at 300km distance and was tested by the Indian Air Force.
